name: Flower Park
description:
Help the residence of Flower Park to feel happy again!

You never know what will happen!

A small game made by:
@Noxlof
@HarleyGlitch

Controls:
Arrow Keys to Move!
Space-bar to Interact, Pick up & Throw!
Enter - Window/Fullscreen

Made in 2 weeks!
It's intentionally suppose to look sloppy, we both wanted to make something that would not take all of our time.

Still working around making MAC/LINUX build with Game Maker Studio. (Contact me: noxlof@gmail.com )

Donations are appreciated :)
